attributes.action: Understand that this Government is Bankrupting this country with Swingeing taxes, and to reduce the tax burden by limiting taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We say ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!public borrowing is increasing because people are borrowing to pay their everyday bills. We are finding the burden of taxes to be too heavy leaving people with no disposable income to save. Taxes on Motoring are particularly heavy epecially with the road pricing issue looming!
